messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] more traveling unschoolers x4
messages.msgSnippet: We are preparing to leave for a 3-month journey up the west coast.  We had planned to leave Saturday morning (today) but we re not ready yet LOL.  So maybe
messages.messageBody:
We are preparing to leave for a 3-month journey up the
west coast. We had planned to leave Saturday morning
(today) but we're not ready yet LOL. So maybe it'll
be Sunday or Monday - that little change sure took the
stress off.

The kids (Quentin 7 & Sierra 4) are all excited. We
bought them new luggage - they each have a small
suitcase with matching backpack. I'm not sure they
can fit ALL of their toys in them, but they are sure
going to try.

We'll leave Tucson and head for San Diego. Then make
a stop at Legoland. And then,...well, that is as far
as we've planned. Our destination is actually
Seattle, where we hope to find a place to rent for a
couple months. We've never been there so if any of
you have suggestions of areas to look, or recommended
stops along the way, please share!

heather mclean
Have laptop, will travel!

__________________________________
Do you Yahoo!?
Yahoo! Calendar - Free online calendar with sync to Outlook(TM).
http://calendar.yahoo.com

messages.subject: Traveling unschooler
messages.msgSnippet: I posted this at the other list, but figured some of you may not read there, so here it is again: I have a request for some of you. There is 15y.o. unschooled
messages.messageBody:
I posted this at the other list, but figured some of you may not read there,
so here it is again:

I have a request for some of you. There is 15y.o. unschooled teen that is a
member of my support group and she is looking for hosts to stay with over the
next couple of months. She's heading out next week and just staying wherever
and traveling until she feels like coming home.
This is a very fun and interesting young lady. She's vegan and a peace
activist and into a lot of different hobbies. We've really enjoyed getting to know
her and I'm sure she'd make a great guest!

She's mainly traveling around the Eastern half of the country (up towards NY
and the Carolinas and such) but may be heading out West to meet up with her
Mum in San Francisco. Her Mom is doing some traveling nursing this summer.
So if any of you would like to host her for a bit, please write me and I'll
give you her email addy. She's leaving next Thursday, so let me know soon if
you can.
Thanks all,

Ren


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
